root.description: Working directory, either '.' or an absolute path.

pre_cmd.description: Commands to run before each build.

post_cmd.description: Commands to run after stopping the application.

bin.description: Binary file produced by the build command.

full_bin.description: Customized binary execution command with environment variables.

args_bin.description: Additional arguments when running the binary.

include_ext.description: File extensions to watch for changes.

exclude_file.description: Specific files to exclude from watching.

exclude_regex.description: Regular expressions matching files to exclude.

exclude_unchanged.description: Exclude unchanged files from triggering rebuilds.

follow_symlink.description: Follow symbolic links in watched directories.

log.description: Log file path, relative to tmp_dir.

poll.description: Use polling to detect file changes instead of fsnotify.

poll_interval.description: Interval in milliseconds for polling file changes.

delay.description: Delay in milliseconds before triggering a rebuild after file changes.

stop_on_error.description: Stop running the old binary when build errors occur.

send_interrupt.description: Send an interrupt signal before killing the process (not supported on Windows).

kill_delay.description: Delay in nanoseconds after sending an interrupt signal before forcefully killing the process.

rerun.description: Rerun the binary automatically after it stops.

rerun_delay.description: Delay in milliseconds before rerunning the binary.

main_only.description: Show only main logs, silencing watcher, build, and runner logs.

silent.description: Silence all logs produced by Air.

clean_on_exit.description: Delete the temporary directory on exit.

clear_on_rebuild.description: Clear the screen on each rebuild.

keep_scroll.description: Keep scrollback history after clearing the screen.

proxy_port.description: Port number for the proxy server.

app_port.description: Port number for the application server.
